timeline.bodyText: I think keeping it M6 would be correct - that's the real first version although only JVM was supported there.
timeline.author: ppalaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +33,7 @@
     <description>The aws2-sns component is used for sending messages to an Amazon Simple Notification Topic.</description>
 
     <properties>
-        <firstVersion>1.0.0-M6</firstVersion>
+        <firstVersion>1.0.0-M7</firstVersion>

timeline.bodyText: How is this asterisk key matched? The S3 extension checks both camel.component.aws2-s3 and camel.component.aws2-* and uses whichever of the two is set?
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: This is a feature introduced in camel 3.2.0, in this case it will set the main options for all aws2-* components
replies.author: oscerd
